Post.title: OGS
Post._content:
{% notel blue %} [ **FAQ** ](/docs/#) {% endnotel %} *** *** ### OGS-017 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |

At the end of your turn, ready 2 runes. | ______

At the end of your turn, ready ___up to___ 2 runes. | *** ### OGS-020 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, ___recall it exhausted instead.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it would die this turn, ___heal it, exhaust it, and recall it instead.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) |
Post.raw:
--- title: OGS date: 2025-08-19 07:30:00 excerpt: "" tags: [OGS, ] --- {% notel blue %} [ **FAQ** ](/docs/#) {% endnotel %} *** *** ### OGS-017 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |

At the end of your turn, ready 2 runes. | ______

At the end of your turn, ready ___up to___ 2 runes. | *** ### OGS-020 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, ___recall it exhausted instead.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it would die this turn, ___heal it, exhaust it, and recall it instead.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) |
Post.content:
FAQ

OGS-017



At the end of your turn, ready 2 runes.

At the end of your turn, ready up to 2 runes.

OGS-020





Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)


Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it would die this turn, heal it, exhaust it, and recall it instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)
Post.more:
FAQ

OGS-017



At the end of your turn, ready 2 runes.

At the end of your turn, ready up to 2 runes.

OGS-020





Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)


Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it would die this turn, heal it, exhaust it, and recall it instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)

Post.title: OGN
Post._content:
{% notel blue %} [ **FAQ** ](/docs/#) {% endnotel %} *** ### OGN-005 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |
3

Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Deal 3 to a unit at a battlefield. If this kills it, draw 1. |
3 ______

Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Deal 3 to a unit at a battlefield. If this kills it, ___do this:___ draw 1. | *** ### OGN-023 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | []______

Discard 1, [E]: Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, you may pay [C] to ___recall it exhausted instead.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) | [] ______

Discard 1, [E]: Choose a friendly unit. The next time it would die this turn, you may pay [C] to ___heal it, exhaust it, and recall it instead.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) | *** ### OGN-025 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |
______

Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each opponent reveals the top card of their Main Deck. ___Choose one and play it___, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest. |
______

Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each opponent reveals the top card of their Main Deck. ___Choose one and banish it, then play it___, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest. | *** ### OGN-032 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |+1+1

tap: The next spell you play deals 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)|______ +1+1

[E]: The next spell you play ___this turn___ deals 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by1.)| *** ### OGN-073 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |

___While I'm at a battlefield,___ ready 4 friendly runes at the end of your turn. | ______

At the end of your turn, ___if I'm at a battlefield,___ ready ___up to___ 4 friendly runes. | *** ### OGN-077 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | [A][0]
______

Hidden (Hide now for [A] to react with later for 0.)
The next time a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. ___Recall that unit exhausted.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) | [A][0]
______

Hidden (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
If a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. ___Heal that unit, exhaust it, and recall it.___ (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) | *** ### OGN-102 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |


Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Banish a friendly unit, then play it to ___base___, ignoring its cost. |


Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Banish a friendly unit, then ___its owner___ plays it to ___their base___, ignoring its cost. | *** ### OGN-107 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | [][]

When I attack, you may pay [C] to play a card with [Hidden] from your hand here, ignoring its cost.| [][]______

When I attack, you may pay [C] to play a card with [Hidden] from your hand, ignoring its cost. ___If its a unit, play it here.___ | *** ### OGN-108 > FAQ | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. ___Increase its Might until it equals the Might of another friendly unit.___ |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. ___This turn, increase its Might to the Might of another friendly unit.___ | *** ### OGN-115 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | ______

Each player looks at the top 5 cards of their Main Deck, chooses one, ___then recycles the rest.___ Starting with the next player, each player plays those cards, ignoring Energy costs. (They must still pay Power costs.) | ______

Each player looks at the top 5 cards of their Main Deck, ___banishes one, then recycles the rest.___ Starting with the next player, each player plays those cards, ignoring Energy costs. (They must still pay Power costs.) | *** ### OGN-118 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | ______

The first time ___friendly unit___ dies each turn, draw 1. | ______

The first time ___another friendly___ unit dies each turn, draw 1. | *** ### OGN-121 / | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | ___[A][0]
[][]1

Hidden (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with , then recycle them.___ | ___[A][0]
[] 1

Hidden (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
When I defend, choose an enemy unit here and reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to that unit for each card with [Hidden] revealed this way, then recycle the revealed cards.___ | *** ### OGN-131 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |___+2___

When I attack, give me ___+2 Might___ if there is a ready enemy unit here.|___+2___

When I attack, give me ___+2 Might this turn___ if there is a ready enemy unit here.| *** ### OGN-141 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | +1

When you play me, buff ___up to___ two other friendly units.(Each one that doesn't have a buff gets a +1 Might buff.) | ______ +1

When you play me, buff ___up to___ two other friendly units.(Each one that doesn't have a buff gets a +1 Might buff.) | *** ### OGN-145 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Prevent all ___spell and ability damage this turn.___ |
______

Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Prevent all damage that would be ___dealt this turn by spells and abilities.___ | *** ### OGN-160 | **** | **** | | -------- | -------- | | ______

At the end of your turn, reveal cards from the top of your Main Deck until you ___reveal a unit.___ Play it, ignoring its cost, and recycle the rest. | ______

FAQ

OGN-005


3

3

OGN-023

[]

Discard 1, [E]: Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, you may pay [C] to recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)		 []

Discard 1, [E]: Choose a friendly unit. The next time it would die this turn, you may pay [C] to heal it, exhaust it, and recall it instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)

OGN-025




Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each opponent reveals the top card of their Main Deck. Choose one and play it, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.


Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each opponent reveals the top card of their Main Deck. Choose one and banish it, then play it, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.

OGN-032

+1+1

tap: The next spell you play deals 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)		 +1+1

[E]: The next spell you play this turn deals 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by1.)

OGN-073



While Im at a battlefield, ready 4 friendly runes at the end of your turn.

At the end of your turn, if Im at a battlefield, ready up to 4 friendly runes.

OGN-077

[A][0]


Hidden (Hide now for [A] to react with later for 0.)
The next time a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. Recall that unit exhausted. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)		 [A][0]


Hidden (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
If a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. Heal that unit, exhaust it, and recall it. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)

OGN-102




Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Banish a friendly unit, then play it to base, ignoring its cost.


Action (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Banish a friendly unit, then its owner plays it to their base, ignoring its cost.

OGN-107

[][]

When I attack, you may pay [C] to play a card with [Hidden] from your hand here, ignoring its cost.		 [][]

When I attack, you may pay [C] to play a card with [Hidden] from your hand, ignoring its cost. If its a unit, play it here.

OGN-108

FAQ



Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. Increase its Might until it equals the Might of another friendly unit.


Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. This turn, increase its Might to the Might of another friendly unit.

OGN-115



Each player looks at the top 5 cards of their Main Deck, chooses one, then recycles the rest. Starting with the next player, each player plays those cards, ignoring Energy costs. (They must still pay Power costs.)

Each player looks at the top 5 cards of their Main Deck, banishes one, then recycles the rest. Starting with the next player, each player plays those cards, ignoring Energy costs. (They must still pay Power costs.)

The first time friendly unit dies each turn, draw 1.

The first time another friendly unit dies each turn, draw 1.

Prevent all spell and ability damage this turn.

At the end of your turn, reveal cards from the top of your Main Deck until you reveal a unit and banish it. Play it, ignoring its cost, and recycle the rest.

[]

When I attack, give me +2 Might if there is a ready enemy unit here.		 +2

When I attack, give me +2 Might this turn if there is a ready enemy unit here.

OGN-141

+1

When you play me, buff up to two other friendly units.(Each one that doesnt have a buff gets a +1 Might buff.)		 +1

When you play me, buff up to two other friendly units.(Each one that doesnt have a buff gets a +1 Might buff.)

OGN-145




Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Prevent all spell and ability damage this turn.


Reaction (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by spells and abilities.

OGN-160



At the end of your turn, reveal cards from the top of your Main Deck until you reveal a unit. Play it, ignoring its cost, and recycle the rest.

At the end of your turn, reveal cards from the top of your Main Deck until you reveal a unit and banish it. Play it, ignoring its cost, and recycle the rest.

OGN-181

[]

[E]: Return another friendly gear, unit, or [Hidden] card to its owners hand.

[E]: Return another friendly gear, unit, or facedown card to its owners hand.

OGN-184

1

[1], [E]: Move a friendly unit at a battlefield to your base.		 [1]

[1], [E]: Move a friendly unit at a battlefield to its base.

OGN-194


[A]

Ganking(I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
When you look at cards from the top of your deck (and dont draw them) and see me, you may play me for [power].
[A]

Ganking (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
As you look at or reveal me from the top of your deck, you may banish me. If you do, you may play me for [A].

OGN-199

[A][0]


[Hidden] (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
When you play me, you may choose a friendly unit. Move me to its location and it to my original location.		 [A][0]


[Hidden] (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
When you play me, you may choose a unit you control at another location. Move me to its location and it to my original location.

OGN-227



If a combat where you are the attacker ends in a tie, recall ALL units instead. (Send them to base. This isnt a move. Ties are calculated after combat damage is dealt.)

If a combat where you are the attacker ends in a tie that would recall any of your units, recall all units at that battlefield instead. (Send them to base. This isnt a move. Ties are calculated after combat damage is dealt.)

OGN-235


[S]+1

Vision (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
When you recycle one or more cards, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesnt have a buff, it gets a +1 might buff. Runes arent cards.)
[]+1

Vision (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
When you recycle one or more cards to your Main Deck, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesnt have a buff, it gets a +1 [M] buff.)

OGN-242

[1][][]1

[1][C], [E]: Kill a friendly unit. Look at the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. You may play a unit from among them that has Might up to 1 more than the killed unit, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.		 [1][] 1

[1][C], [E]: Kill a friendly unit. Look at the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. You may banish a unit from among them that has Might up to 1 more than the killed unit and play it, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.

OGN-258

reflexive trigger



Move an enemy unit. Then choose another enemy unit at its destination. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.

Move an enemy unit. Then do this: Choose another enemy unit at its destination. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.

OGN-259

2

[2], [E]: Move a friendly unit to or from your base.		 [2]

[2], [E]: Move a friendly unit to or from its base.

OGN-269

[A]


When a buffed unit you control would die, you may pay rune and exhaust me to spend its buff and recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)
When you conquer, ready me.		 [A]


If a buffed unit you control would die, you may pay [A], exhaust me, and spend its buff to heal it, exhaust it, and recall it instead. (Send it to base. This isnt a move.)
When you conquer, ready me.

OGN-287



When you conquer here, recycle one of your runes.

When you conquer here, you must recycle one of your runes.

OGN-289



When you conquer here, ready 2 runes at the end of this turn.

When you conquer here, ready up to 2 runes at the end of this turn.

OGN-296

+1+1

Spells and abilities affecting units here each deal 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)		 +1+1

Spells and abilities deal 1 Bonus Damage to units here. (Each instance of damage the spell deals to a unit here is increased by 1.)
